00020 //Qt includes
00021 #include <qdom.h>
00022 #include <qfile.h>

00031 #define CURRENT_SYNTAX_VERSION 1
00032 
00033 CProfile::CProfile( const QString& file, const QString& name ):
00034     m_name(name.isEmpty() ? i18n("unknown") : name),
00035     m_filename(file),
00036     m_fullscreen(false),
00037     m_geometry(0,0,640,480)
00038 {
00039     
00040     m_profileWindows.setAutoDelete(true);
00041     if (!m_filename.isEmpty() && name.isEmpty()) {
00042         loadBasics();
00043     }
00044     else if (m_filename.isEmpty() && !name.isEmpty()) {
00045         m_filename = name;
00046         m_filename.replace(QRegExp("\\s=#."),"_");
00047         KStandardDirs stdDirs;
00048         m_filename = stdDirs.saveLocation("data", "bibletime/profiles/") + m_filename + ".xml";
00049         init(m_filename);
00050     }
00051     else
00052         qWarning("CProfile: empty file name!");
00053 }
00054 
00055 CProfile::~CProfile(){
00056     m_profileWindows.clear();   //delete all CProfileWindows objects (autodelete is enabled)
00057 }
00058 
00060 QPtrList<CProfileWindow> CProfile::load(){
00061     QFile file(m_filename); 
00062     if (!file.exists())
00063         return QPtrList<CProfileWindow>();
00064     
00065     QDomDocument doc;   
00066     if (file.open(IO_ReadOnly)) {       
00067         QTextStream t( &file );
00068         t.setEncoding(QTextStream::UnicodeUTF8);
00069         doc.setContent(t.read());
00070         file.close();   
00071     }
00072     
00073   QDomElement document = doc.documentElement();
00074   if(document.tagName() != "BibleTime") {
00075         qWarning("CProfile::load: Missing BibleTime doc");
00076         return m_profileWindows;
00077     }
00078     if (document.hasAttribute("name")) {
00079         m_name = document.attribute("name");    
00080     }
00081 
00082     
00083     //load settings of the main window
00084     {
00085         // see if there's a section with the name MAINWINDOW
00086         QDomElement elem = document.firstChild().toElement();       
00087         QDomElement mainWindow;
00088         while (!elem.isNull()) {
00089             if (elem.tagName() == "MAINWINDOW") {
00090                 mainWindow = elem;
00091                 break; //found the element
00092             }
00093             elem = elem.nextSibling().toElement();              
00094         }       
00095         if (!mainWindow.isNull()) { //was found
00096             setFullscreen( (bool)mainWindow.attribute("fullscreen").toInt());
00097             QDomElement object = mainWindow.namedItem("GEOMETRY").toElement();
00098             QRect rect;
00099       if(!object.isNull()) {
00100                 if (object.hasAttribute("x")) {
00101                     rect.setX(object.attribute("x").toInt());
00102                 }
00103                 if (object.hasAttribute("y")) {
00104                     rect.setY(object.attribute("y").toInt());
00105                 }
00106                 if (object.hasAttribute("width")) {
00107                     rect.setWidth(object.attribute("width").toInt());
00108                 }
00109                 if (object.hasAttribute("height")) {
00110                     rect.setHeight(object.attribute("height").toInt());
00111                 }
00112             }
00113             setGeometry(rect);          
00114         }
00115     }
00116         
00117     m_profileWindows.clear();
00118     QDomElement elem = document.firstChild().toElement();
00119     while (!elem.isNull()) {
00120         CProfileWindow* p = 0;      
00121         if (elem.tagName() == "BIBLE") {
00122             p = new CProfileWindow(CSwordModuleInfo::Bible);
00123         }
00124         else if (elem.tagName() == "COMMENTARY") {
00125             p = new CProfileWindow(CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary);
00126         }
00127         else if (elem.tagName() == "LEXICON") {
00128             p = new CProfileWindow(CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon);
00129         }           
00130         else if (elem.tagName() == "BOOK") {
00131             p = new CProfileWindow(CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook);
00132         }           
00133         
00134         if (p) {
00135             m_profileWindows.append(p);
00136             
00137             if (elem.hasAttribute("windowSettings")) {
00138                 p->setWindowSettings( elem.attribute("windowSettings").toInt() );
00139             }
00140             
00141             QRect rect;
00142                         
00143             QDomElement object = elem.namedItem("GEOMETRY").toElement();
00144       if(!object.isNull()) {
00145                 if (object.hasAttribute("x")) {
00146                     rect.setX(object.attribute("x").toInt());
00147                 }
00148                 if (object.hasAttribute("y")) {
00149                     rect.setY(object.attribute("y").toInt());
00150                 }
00151                 if (object.hasAttribute("width")) {
00152                     rect.setWidth(object.attribute("width").toInt());
00153                 }
00154                 if (object.hasAttribute("height")) {
00155                     rect.setHeight(object.attribute("height").toInt());
00156                 }
00157                 if (object.hasAttribute("isMaximized")) {
00158                     p->setMaximized( static_cast<bool>(object.attribute("isMaximized").toInt()) );
00159                 }               
00160             }
00161             p->setGeometry(rect);
00162             
00163             object = elem.namedItem("MODULES").toElement();
00164       if(!object.isNull()) {                
00165                 if (object.hasAttribute("list")) {
00166                     const QString sep = object.hasAttribute("separator") ? object.attribute("separator") : "|";
00167                     QStringList modules = QStringList::split(sep, object.attribute("list"));
00168                     p->setModules(modules);
00169                 }
00170       }
00171 
00172             object = elem.namedItem("KEY").toElement();
00173       if(!object.isNull()) {
00174         if (object.hasAttribute("name"))
00175                     p->setKey(object.attribute("name"));
00176       }             
00177                 
00178             object = elem.namedItem("SCROLLBARS").toElement();
00179       if(!object.isNull()) {
00180         int horizontal = 0, vertical = 0;
00181         if (object.hasAttribute("horizontal"))
00182             horizontal = object.attribute("horizontal").toInt();
00183         if (object.hasAttribute("vertical"))
00184             vertical = object.attribute("vertical").toInt();
00185 
00186                 p->setScrollbarPositions(horizontal, vertical);         
00187       }             
00188         }               
00189         elem = elem.nextSibling().toElement();  
00190     }
00191     return m_profileWindows;
00192 }
00193 
00195 const bool CProfile::save(QPtrList<CProfileWindow> windows){
00199     bool ret = false;
00200   QDomDocument doc("DOC");
00201   doc.appendChild( doc.createProcessingInstruction( "xml", "version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"UTF-8\"" ) );
00202 
00203   QDomElement content = doc.createElement("BibleTime");
00204   content.setAttribute("syntaxVersion", CURRENT_SYNTAX_VERSION);
00205   content.setAttribute("name", m_name);
00206   doc.appendChild(content);
00207 
00208   //save mainwindow settings
00209     {
00210         QDomElement mainWindow = doc.createElement("MAINWINDOW");
00211     mainWindow.setAttribute("fullscreen", fullscreen());
00212     
00213     QDomElement geometry = doc.createElement("GEOMETRY");
00214     mainWindow.appendChild(geometry);
00215     const QRect r = this->geometry();
00216     geometry.setAttribute("x",r.x());
00217     geometry.setAttribute("y",r.y());       
00218     geometry.setAttribute("width",r.width());       
00219     geometry.setAttribute("height",r.height());     
00220 
00221         content.appendChild(mainWindow);
00222     }
00223 
00224     for (CProfileWindow* p = windows.first(); p; p = windows.next()) {
00225         QDomElement window;
00226         switch (p->type()) {
00227             case CSwordModuleInfo::Bible:
00228                 window = doc.createElement("BIBLE");    
00229                 break;
00230             case CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary:
00231                 window = doc.createElement("COMMENTARY");   
00232                 break;
00233             case CSwordModuleInfo::Lexicon:
00234                 window = doc.createElement("LEXICON");  
00235                 break;
00236             case CSwordModuleInfo::GenericBook:
00237                 window = doc.createElement("BOOK"); 
00238                 break;
00239             default:
00240                 break;
00241         }
00242         if (window.isNull())
00243             break;
00244         window.setAttribute("windowSettings", p->windowSettings());
00245         
00246         //save geomtery
00247         const QRect r = p->geometry();
00248         QDomElement geometry = doc.createElement("GEOMETRY");
00249         geometry.setAttribute("x",r.x());
00250         geometry.setAttribute("y",r.y());       
00251         geometry.setAttribute("width",r.width());       
00252         geometry.setAttribute("height",r.height());     
00253         geometry.setAttribute("isMaximized",static_cast<int>(p->maximized()));
00254         window.appendChild( geometry );
00255 
00256         QDomElement modules = doc.createElement("MODULES");
00257         modules.setAttribute("separator", "|");
00258         modules.setAttribute("list", p->modules().join("|"));
00259         window.appendChild( modules );      
00260 
00261         QDomElement key = doc.createElement("KEY");
00262         key.setAttribute("name", p->key());
00263         window.appendChild( key );      
00264 
00265         QDomElement scrollbars = doc.createElement("SCROLLBARS");
00266         scrollbars.setAttribute("horizontal", p->scrollbarPositions().horizontal);
00267         scrollbars.setAttribute("vertical", p->scrollbarPositions().vertical);      
00268         window.appendChild( scrollbars );       
00269                         
00270         content.appendChild( window );
00271     }       
00272     
00273     QFile file(m_filename);
00274     if ( file.open(IO_WriteOnly) ) {
00275         ret = true;
00276         QTextStream t( &file );
00277         t.setEncoding(QTextStream::UnicodeUTF8);
00278         t << doc.toString();
00279         file.close();
00280     }
00281     else
00282         ret = false;
00283 
00284     return ret;
00285 }
00286 
00288 const bool CProfile::save(){
00289     return save(m_profileWindows);
00290 }

00303 void CProfile::init(const QString file){
00304     const QString oldFile = m_filename;
00305     m_filename = file;
00306     save(QPtrList<CProfileWindow>());
00307     m_filename = oldFile;
00308 }

00311 void CProfile::setName( const QString& newName ){
00312     m_name = newName;
00313     saveBasics(); //save chanegd name
00314 }
00315 
00317 void CProfile::loadBasics(){
00318     QFile file(m_filename); 
00319     if (!file.exists())
00320         return;
00321 
00322     QDomDocument doc;   
00323     if (file.open(IO_ReadOnly)) {
00324         QTextStream t( &file );
00325         t.setEncoding(QTextStream::UnicodeUTF8);
00326         doc.setContent(t.read());
00327         file.close();           
00328     }
00329   QDomElement document = doc.documentElement();
00330     if (document.hasAttribute("name"))
00331         m_name = document.attribute("name");
00332 }
00333 
00334 void CProfile::saveBasics(){
00335     QFile file(m_filename); 
00336     if (!file.exists())
00337         return;
00338 
00339     QDomDocument doc;   
00340     if (file.open(IO_ReadOnly)) {
00341         QTextStream t(&file);
00342         t.setEncoding(QTextStream::UnicodeUTF8);
00343         doc.setContent(t.read());
00344         file.close();   
00345     }
00346     
00347   QDomElement document = doc.documentElement();
00348     document.setAttribute("name", m_name);  
00349     
00350     if (file.open(IO_WriteOnly)) {  
00351         QTextStream t( &file );
00352         t.setEncoding(QTextStream::UnicodeUTF8);
00353         t << doc.toString();    
00354         file.close();   
00355     }
00356 }
